title: [Whistler's Pass, Crevasse]
description: Icy cold water cascades down one wall and drains along a shallow channel in the floor.  The dark black stone becomes shiny when wet, reflecting the dim moonlight that penetrates the narrow walls of the crevasse.

Icy cold water cascades down one wall and drains along a shallow channel in the floor.  The dark black stone becomes shiny when wet, reflecting the dim light that penetrates the narrow walls of the crevasse.
